title: Him & I
author: G-Eazy, Halsey
lyrics:
[00:00.30] Cross my heart, hope to die

[00:09.06] In the end, it's him and I
[00:11.36] He's out his head, I'm out my mind
[00:14.01] We got that love, the crazy kind
